segments.text: Let me take in this scene—woman at the sink, kids nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's absorbed in her task, towel wrapped around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet drips? No, it's pouring, sink full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading over, hitting the floor with a splash I can almost hear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming, lapping at her feet—wild!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy climbing the stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open doors, cookie jar in sight—he's got it!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's legs are splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide with expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off a sneaky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind the mom's back, classic kid mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside peeks in, all serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a kitchen could hold such surprises?
segments.speaker: PAR
